pkgmetadata.longdescription: Fit Repeated Linear Regressions // When fitting a set of linear regressions which have some same variables, we can separate the matrix and reduce the computation cost. This package aims to fit a set of repeated linear regressions faster. More details can be found in this blog Lijun Wang (2017) https://stats.hohoweiya.xyz/2017/09/26/An-R-Package-Fit- Repeated-Linear-Regressions/.
